item.title: SNAP
item.description: score:-19 Chances: Snap Inc.’s visual messaging application has the potential to attract more users and increase engagement through short videos and images. The acquisition of Fit Finder IP back from Snap indicates potential future developments in the AR-focused business unit. Risks: The sale of shares by the CFO may indicate lack of confidence in the company’s future performance.
